summary: LookyLoo - A file upload app where logged-in users can upload images and short videos (max 2MB), stored in backend canister and displayed with shareable links via file picker interface
architectural_notes: File uploads: images and short videos (max 2MB)
Storage: Backend canister with UI display and shareable links
known_issues: Favicon implementation repeatedly breaks file upload functionality (6 occurrences)
Upload failures show 'Actor not available' and 'Upload failed' errors after favicon changes
File picker broken after favicon modifications

existing_features.title: Diagnose and fix the root cause of 'Actor not available' error that occurs after favicon implementation, ensuring the backend actor initializes correctly for authenticated file uploads
Restore file picker upload functionality for images and short videos (max 2MB), ensuring files can be selected, uploaded in chunks, and stored in the backend canister

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify uploaded files display correctly in the UI with shareable links after fixing the upload failure, maintaining the existing UploadsList component behavior
Ensure the favicon at /assets/generated/favicon.dim_32x32.png continues to display in the browser tab while file upload functionality remains working
